title: Jackie & Roy - Bits And Pieces & The Glory Of Love (1956
description:
JACKIE AND ROY - BITS AND PIECES & THE GLORY OF LOVE

BITS AND PIECES (ABC-Paramount, 1957)
1. Look Around (Holman) Arr: Bill Holman
2. Stopping The Clock (Kral - Landesman) Arr: Quincy Jones
3. Change Of Heart (Kral - Wilder) Arr: Ralph Burns
4. Honey Did (Goldberg) Arr: Ernie Wilkins
5. Whisper Not (Golson) Arr: Jones
6. Say Cheese (Wolf - Landesman) Arr: Kral
7. Aura (Holman) Arr: Holman
8. Darn That Dream (DeLange - Van Heusen) Arr: Burns
9. I'm Forever Blowing Bubbles (Kenbrovin - Kellette) Arr: Wilkins
10. Walking (Carpenter) Arr: Wilkins

THE GLORY OF LOVE (MCA, 1956)
11. The Glory Of Love (Hill)
12. The Best Thing For You (Berlin)
13. I Love You Real (Landesman - Wolf)
14. Could You Use Me (Gershwin)
15. Miz Margret (Kral)
16. Love Is Sweeping The Country (Gershwin)
17. You Inspire Me (Landesman - Wolf)
18. Looking At You (Porter)
19. Where Did The Gentleman Go (Troup)
20. Let's Get Away From It All (Dennis - Adair)
21. Tain't No Use (Cohn)
22. The Winter Of My Discontent (Wilder - Berenberg)

This Jasmine reissue (which like all Jasmine CDs I have heard, is listenable, but should probably sound much better) does not contain any personnel listings.

BITS AND PIECES is Jackie and Roy with a big band. Art Farmer, Phil Woods, Anthony Ortega, Jerome Richardson and Clark Terry are mentioned as players in the liner notes, and as you can see above, the arrangers are also credited.

THE GLORY OF LOVE offers Jackie and Roy with bass, drums and guitar.

Jackie and Roy are of course...

Jackie Cain - vocals
Roy Kral - piano & vocals

2008 Jasmine
